docs.summary: A `ColumnStrip` is a strip of `Column` elements.

srcDocs.summary: A `ColumnStrip` is a strip of `Column` elements.

docs.summary: Gets a list of all the columns contained in the column strip.
description: Note that the column indices in a column strip are zero-based, even though
they are numbered starting from 1 in the Editor.

examples.title: Get the columns of a column strip
Get the columns, number of columns, and ID of the first column from a column strip
